P

peek(int) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DeckIntfc
Displays the Card at a specific location (pos) in the Deck Does not getCard or move Card from Deck to inUse or discards piles
peek(int) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
Does not remove Card from Deck - returns Card at position 'pos' in Deck
Person - Class in com.nickeson
Title: Person.java

Project: Base Library

Description: A class to model a Person

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Person(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.Person
minimal constructor requires first & last name
Person(String, String, String, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.Person
convenience constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation
Player - Class in com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack
Title: Player.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: A subclass of Person for use in Blackjack game play

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Player(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Player
primary constructor requires firstName and lastName at minimum to instantiate a Player
Player(String, String, String, String, List<String>, String, int) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Player
convenience constructor allows firstName and lastName fields, dob, genderIdentity, nickName(s), screenName and acctBalance to be set upon Player instantiation
playerLoop() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Game
Loop through Player(s), playing their Hand, checking for Bust
